ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 1 Year Warranty and FREE Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
Package Includes: •	GW7204C DVR with 500G HDD •	GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor •	1 x GW623C - 1/3" CMOS Camera •	1 x GW736W - 1/3" SONY CCD Camera •	1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC •	1 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC •	2 x GW12V0.5A: 12V0.5A Power Supply for Security Cameras

DVR Support up to 4 Channels, with 500G HDD included. HDMI & VGA. All 4CH have D1 Recroding + D1 Playback
